siteMetadata.title: Drew McMillan - Web Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Personal website of Drew McMillan, a web engineer in London, UK. Drew is currently working at Trainline, transforming the travel experience of people across the EU using React, Node, Redux and Typescript (to name just a few). Having perviously worked at BBC News on a brand new React/Node stack, he has a strong interest in all things frontend web.

node.html:
I am a Software/Web Engineer currently working at Trainline, transforming the travel experience of people across the EU using React, Node, Redux and Typescript (to name just a few). I previously worked at BBC News working primarily on the isomorphic React application Simorgh.

I’m a keen developer, always looking to learn about new technologies and how it improve both the development and user experience. Feel free to take a look at my CV, I’m always interested in hearing about new opportunities.
